Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
With the Flair skill and Alexa, you can now interact with your Flair Pucks and Smart Vents via voice. You can ask Alexa for the current temperatures and set points for your Flair rooms and even have Alexa adjust your set point temperatures. To get started, select the 'Enable Skill' button in the Alexa App to link your Flair account and discover your Flair home and rooms. For help on getting set up, please visit flair.co/alexa-setup. Find more general information about connecting smart home devices at Connect a Smart Home Device to Alexa (tinyurl.com/alexa-smart-home).

When using the skill, you need established names for your devices. We recommend using the default names you previously set up in the Flair app.

Once you know the name of your rooms, you can say the following:

"Alexa, set the living room temperature to 72 degrees."
"Alexa, what is the temperature in the kitchen?"
"Alexa, decrease the bedroom temperature by 2 degrees."

If you have any questions, please visit the Flair skill summary page at flair.co/alexa-setup.

Required Hardware: Flair Puck and/or Flair Smart Vent (available at from www.flair.co)
Required Accounts: Flair account (sign up at my.flair.co)
